responses:
Hi {client_name}, 
 Thanks for the response. I see that <your_company> is into <industry and usecase - one
 liner, minimal words>.
 Our company caters to Web/App development and Marketing to <industry>. Two minds are 
 better than one. We would love to discuss opportunities for your serious business growth.
 Can I schedule a call to discuss possibilities with our business analyst, or you may schedule 
 it here : https://rebrand.ly/yaqvht1 
 Thanks
You may please send your resume to apply@banao.tech if you are interested to working at Banao Technologies.
INR 600 - 1200 / hour (depending upon experience of the designer / developer) and USD 10-15 / hour

patterns: How can you help our business ?
what is your role in our business?
responses:
Hi, 
 We have helped multiple businesses across various industries increase their business. Kindly share your company and contact details so that our business analyst team can do the needful and can reach out to you with solutions tailor-made for your business. 
 Thanks

patterns: What technologies do you work with ?
responses:
Hi, 
 We have a broad range of experience with the following technologies:
 - Full Stack Web Development 
 - App Development (Android + IOS)

 Thanks

Sure,

 Thanks.
